mapper.select: select u.name, u.authorization, u.uni_num, 'Computer-Software' as dept, t.team_name, t.team_id from user as u left outer join team as t on (u.team_id = t.team_id) where uni_num = #{uni_num}
mapper.update: update team set team_name = #{team_name} where team_id = #{team_id};
mapper.select: select score_mid, score_fin, score_team from score where uni_num = #{uni_num};
select post_num, post_name, date_format(postDate, "%Y %c/%e %r") as postDate from post where delYn ="N" and uni_num = #{uni_num};
mapper.update: update user set team_id = NULL where uni_num = #{uni_num};
mapper.select: select team_id, team_name from team where charge_prof = #{uni_num};
